name: Asteroid Swarm 2015
description:
It's Asteroid Swarm 2015! This is my super lo-fi version of the classic, Asteroids.

There are two ways to play the game: either through Unity's WebGL (no download required) or Unity's Webplayer plugin (requires a free download).

With WebGl, you can load it right in your browser without leaving itch.io, or you can download either version of the game and open the .html file in the appropriate folder.

Made in Unity, Photoshop, and FamiTracker

Design, Code, Art: Charlotte Trible (espiongames.com)

Sound: Joe Hanna (joehasdied.com)

Charlotte and Joe make games together as the Bed Bards (thebedbards.party)
